勐.definition: meng (old administrative division in Dai areas of Yunnan); variant of 猛[meng3]

勐海.definition: Menghai county in Xishuangbanna Dai autonomous prefecture 西雙版納傣族自治州|西双版纳傣族自治州[Xi1 shuang1 ban3 na4 Dai3 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
